sql.value: SELECT sys_menu.ID, sys_menu.MENU_NAME, sys_menu.PERMISSION_CODE, sys_menu.ROUTER_PATH, sys_menu.PARENT_ID, sys_menu.MENU_TYPE, sys_menu.IS_MENU, sys_menu.SORT, sys_menu.MENU_STATUS, sys_menu.COMPONENT_PATH, sys_menu.IS_EXTERNAL_LINK, sys_menu.ICON_PATH FROM sys_menu WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 1 #[and IS_MENU = :isMenu] ORDER BY SORT

SELECT sys_menu.ID, sys_menu.MENU_NAME, sys_menu.PERMISSION_CODE, sys_menu.ROUTER_PATH, sys_menu.PARENT_ID, sys_menu.MENU_TYPE, sys_menu.IS_MENU, sys_menu.SORT, sys_menu.MENU_STATUS, sys_menu.COMPONENT_PATH, sys_menu.IS_EXTERNAL_LINK, sys_menu.ICON_PATH from sys_menu where ID in (select MENU_ID from sys_role_menu where ROLE_ID in (select ROLE_ID from sys_user_role where USER_ID = :userId)) #[and sys_menu.IS_MENU = :isMenu] and DELETE_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY SORT, CREATE_TIME desc

SELECT sys_menu.ID, sys_menu.MENU_NAME, sys_menu.PERMISSION_CODE, sys_menu.ROUTER_PATH, sys_menu.PARENT_ID, sys_menu.MENU_TYPE, sys_menu.IS_MENU, sys_menu.SORT, sys_menu.MENU_STATUS, sys_menu.COMPONENT_PATH, sys_menu.IS_EXTERNAL_LINK, sys_menu.ICON_PATH FROM sys_menu WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 1 #[AND ID in (select MENU_ID from sys_role_menu where ROLE_ID=:roleId)] ORDER BY SORT

SELECT sys_menu.ID, sys_menu.MENU_NAME, sys_menu.PERMISSION_CODE, sys_menu.ROUTER_PATH, sys_menu.PARENT_ID, sys_menu.MENU_TYPE, sys_menu.IS_MENU, sys_menu.MENU_STATUS, sys_menu.SORT, sys_menu.COMPONENT_PATH, sys_menu.IS_EXTERNAL_LINK, sys_menu.ICON_PATH, sys_menu.CREATE_TIME, sys_menu.UPDATE_TIME FROM sys_menu WHERE DELETE_STATUS = 1 #[and IS_MENU = :isMenu] #[and PERMISSION_CODE = :permissionCode] #[and ROUTER_PATH = :routerPath] #[and MENU_NAME like :menuName] #[and MENU_STATUS = :menuStatus] ORDER BY SORT, CREATE_TIME desc
